item.description:
Join me at Tia's for Thirsty Thursday!

It's the Thursday before the unofficial start of summer weekend, so I'll drink to that!

I'll be there from 5:15ish to 7:30ish, but feel free to come and go as you please.

Please maintain your own tab or pay as you go because people will be arriving and leaving at various times. There will be no group tab.

UPDATE: There's a good chance of rain; however, I will be there rain or shine because Tia's has a covered area.

Let the patio season begin!

Looking forward to seeing you all there!

Cheers!

Lisa
item.why: To have a drink at an outdoor patio
item.name: Thirsty Thursday At Tia's!
